import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RecordList=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();// Example records
const[records,setRecords]=useState([{id:1,name:"Rose Bouquet",price:"$25"},{id:2,name:"Tulip Arrangement",price:"$30"}]);const goToAdd=()=>{navigate("/add");};const goToEdit=record=>{navigate("/edit",{state:{record}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"record-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Manage Records"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goToAdd,children:"Add New Record"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"records",children:records.map(record=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"record-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:record.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:record.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>goToEdit(record),children:"Edit"})]},record.id))})]});};export default RecordList;
